TopicTitle: Is there a Fuel switch mod and wheel stress removal mod for 1.1?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I've grown used to using Porkjet's MM patch, which I think used firespitter, to switch fuel types in the VAB/SPH. I downloaded the updated versions of Interstellar fuel switch and Firespitter just in case and copy pasted the patch file from my 1.0.5 installation, but it's not working. So, am I doing something wrong or is there an alternative way to switch fuels in 1.1?

 

Also, is there some mod/MM patch to override the whole rover wheel mechanic? My heavier 1.0.5 are simply broken in 1.1 and I'm not sure if heavy rovers are possible at all in 1.1
